title: 朋友MOD
author: wzksnc
txt_content: 那个朋友mod怎么装，这是MOD里面的文件：[attach]5490[/attach]

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
之前有人問過, 大家一樣都不看說明文件的... 

MODLOADER REQUIRED!
AUDIOMOD REQUIRED!

Installation Instructions:-
1. Add files from "Add to jar" To the minecraft.jar.
2. Add folder "mod_Friend" to folder ".minecraft" (the one /bin is in!).
3. Add the contents of "Add to Resources" to Resources in your /.minecraft/
3. Open folder "mod_Friend" (the one in .minecraft) and then edit "Choose_Config_Here.txt" to the name of the config you wish to load.
4. Be sure to add the texture to the minecraft.jar(best putting it in the /mobs folder inside minecraft.jar).
5. Start Minecraft and have fun!

If you do not change the config your friend will be Minecraft's own: Steve.


先裝 MODLoader 以及 AudioMod
1. 把"Add to jar"文件夾中的東西全丟進 minecraft.jar
2. 把"mod_Friend"文件夾丟到遊戲目錄".minecraft"
3. 把"Add to Resources"文件夾中的東西全丟進 /.minecraft/Resources
3. 打開並編輯 .minecraft\mod_Friend\Choose_Config_Here.txt 改變朋友設置,
    不然你就只能用遊戲原有的造型: Steve
4. 確定增加人物皮膚貼圖, 最好放進 minecraft.jar 的 mob 文件夾中
5. 玩遊戲...

若還有其他問題就看看原帖吧
